unit_specific.description: Models in this unit have a 5+ Feel No Pain.

Each time a melee attack is allocated to a model in this unit, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6 (to a maximum of six D6 per attacking unit): for each 4+, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

composition_and_wargear.default_wargear_text: Every model is equipped with: hideous mutations.

leader: This unit cannot be led by any Character and cannot lead other units.
